messages.title: Why we're backing Labour
messages.content: Content discusses why various individuals are endorsing Labour, mentioning optimism around the economy, investment in public services, support for working families, and reform in banking. Notable endorsers include J.K. Rowling.

messages.title: Vote Labour
messages.content: Encourages voting for Labour to ensure support for working families, a strong Britain within Europe, and improved healthcare and schools.

issues.brexitEurope: Support for a strong Britain within Europe.
issues.economy: The message suggests optimism towards the economy if Labour wins.

endorsements.endorsement: Expresses lack of trust in the Conservatives' claim of change, criticizing their priorities. She believes the Labour government is the better option.

quotes.text: We all agree on one thing. Itâ€™s vital that Labour wins this election. Because if we make a mess of the economy now, we are in deep trouble.

images.caption: Several photos of individuals endorsing Labour along with quotes.
